content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generation at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=-0.5, y=5.5)
Consists of:
-   Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) extracting water.
-   PipeGroup transporting water from the pump to the boiler (fluid\_system=6154, pipes include (x=-8.5,y=-0.5) to (x=-7.5,y=2.5)).
-   Boiler at (x=-5.5, y=2.0) consuming water and fuel (currently has coal) to produce steam.
-   PipeGroup transporting steam from the boiler to the steam engine (fluid\_system=6158, pipes include (x=-5.5,y=0.5) to (x=-0.5,y=2.5)).
-   Steam Engine (Generator) at (x=-0.5, y=5.5) consuming steam to generate electricity. *Note: Connected to a local power grid (ID 122948) but not yet successfully connected to the main factory area.*

### Stone Mining, Smelting, and Wall Production Area (around x=-55, y=23)
*This area is undergoing significant modification. Many entities were removed in Step 69.*
Consists of the following remaining entities (as of Step 71):
